cards.name: Gyarados-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Draconic Disaster
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 100 more damage. Then, discard that Stadium card.

attacks.name: Dread Storm-GX
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from each of your opponent's Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Alolan Golem-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Super Electromagnetic Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Heavy Rock-GX
attacks.text: Your opponent can't play any cards from their hand during their next turn. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Nihilego-GX

ability.name: Empty Light
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may leave both Active Pokémon Confused and Poisoned.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Lock Up
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Symbiont-GX
attacks.text: Add the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck to their Prize cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Buzzwole-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Jet Punch
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Knuckle Impact
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Absorption-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each of your remaining Prize cards. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Guzzlord-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Eat Sloppily
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Energy cards, attach them to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Glutton-GX
attacks.text: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, take 2 more Prize cards. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Kartana-GX

ability.name: Slice Off
ability.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may discard a Special Energy from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Gale Blade
attacks.text: You may shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Blade-GX
attacks.text: Take a Prize card. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Alolan Exeggutor-GX
text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Tropical Head
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dragon Hammer
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Tower-Go-Round-GX
attacks.text: Move any number of Energy from your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Silvally-GX

ability.name: Gyro Unit
ability.text: Your Basic Pokémon in play have no Retreat Cost.

text: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Turbo Drive
attacks.text: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rebel-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Gladion
text: Look at your face-down Prize cards and put 1 of them into your hand. Then, shuffle this Gladion into your remaining Prize cards and put them back face down. If you didn’t play this Gladion from your hand, it does nothing.

cards.name: Lusamine
text: Put 2 in any combination of Supporter and Stadium cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Olivia
text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokémon-GX, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
